promediocol <- function(z, quitar.NA = TRUE){
  nc= ncol(z)
  medias <- vector("numeric", nc)
  for (i in 1:nc) {
    medias[i] <- mean(z[,i], na.rm = quitar.NA)
  }
  medias
}
